TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PeerNameType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義要建立的 類型。

span.span: Defines the type of to create.

summary.span: 對等名稱不是有受到保護就是未受到保護。

span.span: A peer name is either secured or unsecured.

summary.span: 受保護的對等名稱可提供名稱擁有權的證明。

span.span: A secured peer name provides a proof of ownership of the name.

summary.span: 未受保護的對等名稱則沒有相關聯的識別 (Identity)。

span.span: An unsecured peer name has no identity associated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 節點必須具有存取權的公開金鑰相關聯的私密金鑰用來建立安全，以證明擁有權。A node must have access to the private key associated with the public key, used in creating the secured , in order to prove ownership. 節點沒有公用的索引鍵的關聯性。The node does not have a relationship to a public key. 「 對等名稱的格式： *Authority.Classifier*。The format of a peer name is: *Authority.Classifier*. 值取決於名稱是否為安全的對等名稱或不安全的對等名稱。The value of depends on whether the name is a secured peer name or an unsecured peer name. 部份名稱可以設定為任何字串，其中包含 15 個 Unicode 字元，包括`null`結束字元。The part of the name can be set to any string that contains 15 or fewer Unicode characters, including the `null` terminator. 一次，且已建立的對等的安全性層級，對等可以也使用來參考相對的名稱或主機名稱。Once the , and security level of a peer have been established, a peer can also be referred to with a relative name or a host name. 只有擁有者或對等主機，可以註冊以安全的對等名稱[PNRP 命名空間提供者 API](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=92731)。Only the owner, or peer host, can register a secure peer name with the [PNRP Namespace Provider API](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=92731). 任何節點可以宣告任何不安全的擁有權。Any node can claim ownership to any unsecured . **請注意**使用安全不會保證網路的應用程式的整體安全性。**Note** Using a secured does not ensure the overall security of a networking application. 應用程式的安全性是與實作相依。Security of the application is implementation-dependent.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameType Secured = int32(0)

summary.span: 使用目前使用者的身分識別建立受保護的 。

span.span: Create a secured using the identity of current user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameType Unsecured = int32(1)

summary.span: 使用目前使用者的身分識別建立未受保護的 。

span.span: Create an unsecured using the identity of current user.
